set_remaining_methods_details(value: list)[source]

Sets the value of remaining_methods_details. This functions initializes the data list for the Veto, Borda, Approbation, and Simple plurality voting methods.

Parameters:

value – The value to affect

show_approbation_information(approval_radius: int, frame: Toplevel)[source]

Gives a definition of Approbation voting system.

Parameters:

  • approval_radius – Radius of the approval circle

  • frame – The frame used to show the details of the voting method

show_borda_information(maximum: int, step: int, frame: Toplevel)[source]

Gives a definition of Borda voting system.

Parameters:

  • step – Step between two scores (ex: if max=100 and step=5, score attribution: 100, 95, 90, …)

  • maximum – maximum score to attribute to the top candidate

  • frame – Frame from which vote method details details popup should generate

  • maximum – Maximum score to attribute to the top candidate

  • frame – The frame used to show the details of the voting method

show_condorcet_information(method, tie_breaking_rule, frame: Toplevel)[source]

Gives a definition of condorcet voting system.

Parameters:

  • method – Method to use in case there is no Condorcet winner

  • tie_breaking_rule – Tie-breaking rule to use to decide who wins

  • frame – The frame used to show the details of the voting method

show_condorcet_steps(frame: Toplevel)[source]

Displays score details for Condorcet.

Parameters:

frame – Frame to build popup on

frame – The frame used to show the details of the voting method
